README.md:
# Monorepo Project

A multi-package monorepo with nested intent layer.
AGENTS.md:
# AGENTS.md

## Build & Development

- Use `npm run build` to build all packages
- Use `npm test` to run all tests

## Project Structure

This is a monorepo with multiple packages.
packages/api/AGENTS.md:
# API Package

## Purpose

REST API implementation.

## Key Files

- `src/handler.ts` - Main request handler
- `src/routes/` - Route definitions
packages/core/AGENTS.md:
# Core Package

## Purpose

Shared utilities and business logic.

## Key Files

- `src/utils.ts` - Utility functions
